SymptomAnalyzer.title: Symptom Analyzer
SymptomAnalyzer.subtitle: Describe how you're feeling and we'll suggest which conditions to check

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: Describe your symptoms in your own words. Our system analyzes them and suggests relevant health checks.

SymptomAnalyzer.placeholder: Example: headache and fever since last 2 days

invalid.title: Input unclear
invalid.message: We couldn’t understand your symptoms clearly.

SymptomAnalyzer.disclaimer: This is not a diagnosis. Please consult a healthcare professional.

high.label: High Urgency
high.description: Your symptoms may indicate a serious or life-threatening condition.

moderate.label: Moderate Urgency
moderate.description: Your symptoms need timely medical attention.
moderate.advice: Consult a doctor as soon as possible.

low.label: Low Urgency
low.advice: Monitor your condition and take rest.

high.name: Heart Attack
high.description: A serious condition caused by blocked blood flow to the heart.

high.name: Stroke
high.description: A medical emergency caused by interrupted blood supply to the brain.

moderate.name: Hypertension
moderate.description: Elevated blood pressure that requires monitoring and treatment.

moderate.name: Migraine
moderate.description: Recurring headaches often accompanied by nausea or light sensitivity.

low.name: Common Cold
low.description: A viral infection of the upper respiratory tract.

low.name: Indigestion
low.description: Discomfort caused by difficulty in digesting food.
